title: Do preseason ranked games really matter?
body: I was just wondering if the ranked games we play right now, matter for next season? At the end of season 4 I managed to get myself to Silver 5; during preseason I managed to climb to Gold 3, will this have an impact on my next season rank?

replies.body: A little. All ranked games affect your MMR, but there is a soft reset at the start of the next season which "normalises" your MMR and basically kind of nullifies some of your preseason movement.
Yes because the games still affect your MMR which will be taken into account when you do your placements next season.

Im no expert on the subject but apparently the higher we get in the pre-season/s4 the less games we need to win in s5 preliminaries to rank higher.

like i said im no expert so don't quote me, i could be wrong, but thats how i understand it

Btw congrats on climbing :)
Find it awkward in the first place how and why we can play Ranked in preseason.
